title: Investing 2020s With Kirk Spano Episode #2: Shareholder Yield And Tail Risk With Meb Faber
description: Cambria Funds co-founder, CEO and CIO Meb Faber joins Margin of Safety Investing's Kirk Spano to discuss his firm's tail risk and shareholder yield ETF suites. Funds covered include: TAIL, FAIL, SYLD, FYLD and EYLD.
